com.aionemu.commons.configuration
Interface PropertyTransformer<T>

Type Parameters:
T - Type of returned value
All Known Implementing Classes:
BooleanTransformer, ByteTransformer, CharTransformer, ClassTransformer, DoubleTransformer, EnumTransformer, FileTransformer, FloatTransformer, InetSocketAddressTransformer, IntegerTransformer, LongTransformer, PatternTransformer, ShortTransformer, StringTransformer
public interface PropertyTransformer<T>

This insterface represents property transformer, each transformer should implement it.

Author:
SoulKeeper

            java.lang.reflect.Field field)

This method actually transforms value to object instance

Parameters:
